page.title: 15LOCAL NEWS REPORT
page.content: THE TOPICAL ITEM AT THIS TIME,SUNDAY JULY 8th,IS THE{RHONDDA RUN FOR FUN}. THIS IS A{10 MILE RACE}FROM THE RHONDDA SPORTS CENTRE,YSTRAD UP TO TREORCHY SQUARE TOWARDS CWMPARC,BACK DOWN THE VALLEY TO TONYPANDY THEN RETURN TO THE SPORTS CENTRE. CWMPARC SCHOOL TEACHER,SELWYN JONES INITIATED AND ORGANISED THE EVENT FOLLOWING THE SUCCESS OF THE LONDON MARATHON 5 YEARS AGO.IN THE{1st EVENT OVER 500 RUNNERS TOOK PART WHILST{TODAY OVER 2,200 {ENTRANTS}HOPE TO ENJOY THE CARNIVAL COMMUNITY ATMOSPHERE GENERATED BY THE FUN RUN.ITS UNEQUALLED COMMUNITY SUPPORT HELPS GIVE A WARM VALLEY WELCOME TO RUNNERS FROM ALL OVER THE COUNTRY{.THE FUN RUNNERS HAVE RAISED {Â£1000'S FOR CHARITY}THROUGH THE EFFORTS OF MR.JONES AND CO-ORGANISER MR. BRIAN DAVIES OF THE RHONDDA BOROUGH COUNCIL.
